# Class 1 {#class1}

::: callout-important
## Activities recap before Class 1

Note that this is a repeat of the activities already mentioned in '[Importance of RDM](https://estherplomp.github.io/TNW-RDM-101/02-Importance-of-RDM.html)' (total estimated time: *80-100 minutes*)

-   Watch the presentation on '[Why is RDM important](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1eJ8R7DbiPRq2ynaImHGzdz8QBgwVt82o/view?usp=sharing)'? (*8 minutes*)
-   Read [@markowetz2015]: Five selfish reasons to work reproducibly OR [Watch the presentation](https://youtu.be/1Y_oIjlH-yg?t=355) (*50 minutes*)
-   Create a GitHub issue (see [Assignment 1](https://estherplomp.github.io/TNW-RDM-101/03-Assignment-GitHub-1.html)) (*10-30 minutes*)
-   Respond to [GitHub discussion #125](https://github.com/EstherPlomp/TNW-RDM-101/discussions/125) with your data challenge (*1-5 minutes*)
:::

## **Class 1 (*120 minutes*)**

-   Introductions
-   Discuss why RDM is important to you
    -   Do you find the horror stories or the benefits more convincing?
    -   Do you have a horror story to share?
-   Introduction Data Flow Map assignment
-   Check GitHub Issue
-   Importance of Documentation
